description:
- The struggle for existence begins! -
With all of the Energy Points unleashed, Nostradamus foretells of a bleak future,
leaving Ren feeling uneasy. Amidst this new development,
President Madarame announces his newest project to the world.
And just when it seems like things couldn`t get any worse,
Ren and Ryoma`s greatest foe appears: Eden.
Meanwhile, long after watching in silence, Miroku begins to make her move...
Source: Youtube
